T02D2963:45a-0: @45a * // dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2963:45a-1: brten pa chos nyid kyi srog bsgrub par 'dod pa'i
T02D2963:45a-2: sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang
T02D2963:45a-3: yid dang mthun par mandal dang /
T02D2963:45a-4: me tog dang bum pa la sogs pa sngon du bya ba'i rim pas /
T02D2963:45a-5: ji ltar rigs pa rdzogs par byas la bdag nyid
T02D2963:45a-6: kyis khrus gsum rdzogs par byas la gos gsum brje
T02D2963:45a-7: zhing lhag par mos pa'i bsam gtan legs par yid
T02D2963:45a-9: h'um las byung ba'i khro bo dbyug pa sngon po
T02D2963:45a-10: can sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa
T02D2963:45a-11: rin po che'i dbyug pa dang /
T02D2963:45a-14: sdigs mdzub can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzugs su blta bar bya'o //
T02D2963:45a-15: de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te /
T02D2963:45a-16: gnyis su med par brtan par bdag nyid kyi snying
T02D2963:45a-17: gar bsdus te las dang bag chags thams cad rnam
T02D2963:45a-19: de nas yungs kar la sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te /
T02D2963:45a-20: bum pa'i nang du legs par blugs la zla ba
T02D2963:45a-21: gcig la lan bdun bdun du byas na bstan pa'i
T02D2963:45a-22: snying po nges par 'grub pa ni sngags 'dis bya'o
T02D2963:45a-23: // aom ma tha badzra h'um h'um phat phat sv'a
T02D2963:45a-24: h'a zhes zla ba bdun gyi bar du bsgrubs na
T02D2963:45b-0: yid gzhungs shing dbang dang @45b ldan par 'gyur ro
T02D2963:45b-1: // // rgyud kyi brtan pa zhes bya ba'i tshig
T02D2963:45b-2: legs par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba slob dpon ye
